content: this pattern is also available for free here https //spinayarncrochet com/squid-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ this unique squid crochet pattern is crafted in separate panels worked flat and then joined together the pattern is written in us crochet terminology the printable pdf contains 5 pages including the cover page the finished measurements are approximately 25cm/10 tall the pattern is worked in worsted weight yarn and a 3 25mm hook but it can be worked in any weight yarn to make it bigger or smaller as desired
